scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/llm',{recursive:true}); require('fs').copyFileSync('src/llm/llm.yaml','dist/llm/llm.yaml');" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='dist/summary/template'; fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true}); fs.mkdirSync(p+'/images',{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/summary/template/sessionbridge-report.html', p+'/sessionbridge-report.html'); fs.copyFileSync('src/summary/template/styles.css', p+'/styles.css'); const imgs=fs.readdirSync('src/summary/template/images'); imgs.forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync('src/summary/template/images/'+f, p+'/images/'+f));"
